caption.p: Power spectra for the time‐series global annual net biome production (NBP), net primary production (NPP), heterotrophic respiration (RH), and disturbance (D) fluxes from the 13 Community Earth System Model Last Millennium Ensemble (CESM‐LME) full‐forcing simulations over the period 850‐1849. The shaded areas span the spectra of individual ensemble members and the ensemble mean of the individual spectra is overlaid.
